/* cetusMobigenDatasetTag.getMobigenDatasetTagList */ SELECT CMT.UID AS TAG_UID ,CMT.TAG_NM AS TAG_NM FROM CETUS_MOBIGEN_TAG CMT WHERE 1 = 1
AND CMT.TAG_NM LIKE '%' || #{tagNm} || '%'

/* cetusMobigenDatasetTag.getMobigenDatasetTagListByDatasetId */ SELECT CMDT.UID ,CMDT.TAG_UID ,CMT.TAG_NM AS TAG_NM FROM CETUS_MOBIGEN_DATASET_TAG CMDT INNER JOIN CETUS_MOBIGEN_TAG CMT ON CMT.UID = CMDT.TAG_UID WHERE CMDT.DATASET_UID = #{datasetUid}
